ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure

Class CommentLayoutBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure.CommentLayoutBuilder

  • public class CommentLayoutBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores all of the layout builders needed for interacting with comments. This prepares data and the view, but does not display anything. Its sister class CommentView creates the GUI From data set in this class
    Author:
    James Cadek
